Open surgery has proven to be a safe and minimally accessible procedure. Fewer than half of our selected cohort of patients reported symptomatic improvement in a 1-month follow-up.

src: in the present study , the antioxidant activity of successive leaf extracts of dracaena reflexa was investigated using the scavenging activity on 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl and reducing power by ferric reducing antioxidant power assay . methanol extract was found potent in both the assays . ic50 values of 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl assay for methanol extract was 0.97 mg / ml and ferric reducing antioxidant power value for the same is 1.19 .
bt: In this study, the antioxidant activity of successive dracaena reflex leaf extracts was investigated using the recharge activity in 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl and the reduction of potency by reducing the antioxidant potency in both trials. It was found that the methanol extract was potent in both trials.

src: in the absence of fresh frozen tissue for if , immunohistochemistry with c4d aids in the diagnosis.a total 48 cases of mn diagnosed on renal biopsy were analyzed . the formalin fixed paraffin embedded tissues were stained with routine hematoxylin and eosin stains along with periodic acid - schiff and silver methenamine stains to highlight the basement membrane . fresh frozen tissues were available for if in 40 cases .
bt: In the absence of fresh frozen tissue, a total of 48 cases of renal biopsy diagnosed with immunohistochemical assists were analysed.Tissue embedded in formalin paraffin fixed were stained with routine haematoxylin and eosin stains together with periodic stains of acid-schiff and silver methane to highlight the basal membrane.

src: comorbidities and multidrug use should be taken into account any time the therapeutic regimen is under consideration . different classes of antifungal drugs are available for the treatment of invasive fungal infections but echinocandins , apart from their activity against resistant strains ( candida glabrata and candida krusei ) , seem to be safe , with limited adverse events and minimal drug drug interactions in comparison to the other regimens . therefore , these agents are strongly recommended when dealing with elderly patients suffering from an invasive form of candida infection .
bt: Comorbidities and the use of multiple medications should be considered at any time the therapeutic regimen is considered. There are different classes of antifungal drugs available for the treatment of invasive fungal infections, but echinocandins, apart from their activity against resistant strains (candida glabrata and candida krusei), appear to be safe, with limited adverse effects and minimal medical interactions compared to other regimens.

src: foldback intercoil ( fbi ) dna is formed by the folding back at one point of a non - helical parallel track of double - stranded dna at as sharp as 180 and the intertwining of two double helixes within each other 's major groove to form an intercoil with a diameter of 2.2 nm . fbi dna has been suggested to mediate intra - molecular homologous recombination of a deletion and inversion . inter - molecular homologous recombination , known as site - specific insertion , on the other hand , is mediated by the direct perpendicular approach of the fbi dna tip , as the attp site , onto the target dna , as the attb site .
bt: Intermolecular homologous recombination, known as site-specific insertion, is measured by the direct perpendicular approach of the DNA fbi, as the tip site, of the DNA target, as the tip site, and the process is regulated by epigenetic mechanisms.

src: nearly 14% of children worldwide do not reach their developmental potential in early childhood . the early identification of delays in achieving milestones is critical . the world health organization ( who ) has developed normal age ranges for the achievement of motor milestones by healthy children .
bt: Nearly 14% of children worldwide do not reach their developmental potential in early childhood. Early identification of delays in reaching milestones is critical. The World Health Organization (WHO) has developed normal age ranges for achieving motor milestones for healthy children, and this is crucial for early intervention.

src: histopathological findings showed that 90% of lesions were lymphoepithelioma - like carcinoma ( lelca ) and a few lesions were non - invasive transitional cell carcinoma . on microscopy , syncytial growth pattern and indistinct cytoplasmic borders were observed with the severe infiltration of lymphoid cells . the case was followed - up for 8 months without recurrence .
bt: Histopathological findings showed that 90% of lesions were lymphoepitheliomas - such as carcinoma (leuka) and some lesions were non-invasive transient cell carcinomas.

src: the objective of this study was to test the efficacy of ngf in sca3 patients.we performed an open - label prospective study in genetically confirmed adult ( > 18 years old ) sca3 patients . ngf was administered by intramuscular injection ( 18 g once daily ) for 28 days consecutively . all the patients were evaluated at baseline and 2 and 4 weeks after treatment using the chinese version of the scale for assessment and rating of ataxia ( sara).twenty - one sca3 patients ( 10 men and 11 women , mean age 39.14 7.81 years , mean disease duration 4.14 1.90 years , mean cag repeats number 77.57 2.27 ) were enrolled .
bt: The aim of this study was to test the efficacy of ngf in patients with sca3. we conducted an open prospective study in adult sca3 patients (over 18 years) with genetic confirmation. ngf was administered by intramuscular injection (18 mg once daily) for 28 consecutive days. All patients were evaluated at the starting point and 2 and 4 weeks after treatment using the Chinese version of the scale for assessment and classification of ataxia (SARA).

src: bifid condyle is a rare anatomic variation of mandibular condyle . it can be symptomatic or diagnosed incidentally on routine radiographic examination . no definite etiologic factor has been identified .
bt: Bifide condyle is a rare anatomical variation of the mandibular condyle. It can be symptomatic or diagnosed incidentally on a routine X-ray examination.

src: there were no significant differences between normal and pseudophakic eyes among subjects aged 5069 ( p > 0.05 ) . among subjects aged 7079 , pseudophakic eyes showed improved simulated va ( p = 0.000 ) and objective scattering index values ( p = 0.008 ) . patients with intraocular lenses have similar or superior visual function when compared to those with normal eyes at 26 months after cataract surgery , even under low - contrast conditions .
bt: There were no significant differences between normal and pseudophagous eyes among subjects aged 5069 years (p > 0.05 years). Among subjects aged 7079 years, pseudophagous eyes showed improvements in the dispersion index of simulated values (p = 0.000) and targets (p = 0.008 years).

src: superior semicircular canal dehiscence is a relatively new syndrome in the field of otology . it is of unknown etiology presenting with a variety of vestibular and auditory symptoms and radiologic findings play a crucial role in its diagnosis . cone beam computed tomography has been shown to be a powerful tool in the field of otolaryngology .
bt: The dissociation of the upper semicircular canal is a relatively new syndrome in the field of otology. It is of unknown etiology presenting a variety of vestibular and auditory symptoms and radiological findings play a crucial role in its diagnosis.

src: the scores were recorded and compared within and between groups pre - treatment , immediately post - treatment , and 3 months post - treatment . [ results ] intra- and intergroup comparisons immediately and 3 months post - treatment showed extracorporeal shock wave therapy decreased pain to a significantly greater extent than ultrasound therapy . [ conclusion ] extracorporeal shock wave therapy can significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis elbow .
bt: Scores were recorded and compared within and between groups before treatment, immediately after treatment and 3 months after treatment [results].Intra- and intergroup comparisons immediately and 3 months after treatment showed that extracorporeal shock wave therapy reduced pain to a significantly greater extent than ultrasound therapy [conclusion].Extracorporeal shock wave therapy can significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis elbow and improve arm function.

src: the positive and negative syndrome scale ( panss ) was applied to assess the psychotic symptoms and aggression risk at baseline , week 2 , 4 , and 6 of the study.the results of this study showed that both protocols significantly decreased the scores on all subscales of the panss and supplemental aggression risk subscale as well as panss total score over the study . however , this improvement was significantly higher in zn sulfate receiving group compared to the placebo group . no major clinical side - effects were detected.it may be concluded that zn is an effective adjuvant agent in the management of patients with schizophrenia .
bt: The positive and negative syndrome scale (pans) was applied to assess psychotic symptoms and risk of aggression at the starting line, week 2, 4 and 6 of the study. The results of this study showed that both protocols significantly decreased scores across all pans sub-scales and the supplemental aggression risk sub-scale, as well as the overall PANES score in the study. However, this improvement was significantly greater in the zinc sulfate receptor group compared to the placebo group.

src: the written information contained in the accident reports pertaining to contextual and technical elements were used.the study used multiple case qualitative content analysis . this descriptive study was based on the content analysis of the 788 reports from the commission de la sant et de la scurit du travail du qubec [ workers compensation board ( wcb ) ] investigating the fatal work - related accidents between 1990 and 2005 . the study was descriptive ( number and percentages ) .
bt: The study used qualitative content analysis of multiple cases, and this descriptive study was based on the content analysis of the 788 reports of the Quebec Health and Safety Commission (Workers' Compensation Commission (wcb)) investigating fatal work-related accidents between 1990 and 2005.

src: functional gastrointestinal disorder ( fgid ) is one of the commonest digestive diseases worldwide and leads to significant morbidity and burden on healthcare resource . the putative bio - psycho - social pathophysiological model for fgid underscores the importance of psychological distress in the pathogenesis of fgid . concomitant psychological disorders , notably anxiety and depressive disorders , are strongly associated with fgid and these psychological co - morbidities correlate with severity of fgid symptoms .
bt: The supposed bio-psycho-social pathophysiological model for fgid underlines the importance of psychological stress in the pathogenesis of fgid. Concomitant psychological disorders, especially anxiety and depressive disorders, are strongly associated with fgid and these psychological co-morbidities correlate with the severity of fgid symptoms and the emotional impact they cause.

src: chest pain is a rare sign of thoracal endometriosis associated with endometrioma of the tubo - ovarian endometrioma . we report the case periodic episodes of chest pain concurrent with menstruation in a 35-year - old female , in which ovarian endometrioma was diagnosed and left - sided oophorectomy was performed . after surgery , patient underwent medical treatment which included a gn - rh agonist and a combined oral contraceptive .
bt: Chest pain is a rare sign of chest endometriosis associated with tube endometrium - ovarian endometrium. We reported the case of periodic episodes of chest pain simultaneously with menstruation in a 35-year-old woman, in which ovarian endometrium was diagnosed and left side ooforectomy was performed. After surgery, the patient underwent medical treatment that included a gene agonist, a combined oral contraceptive and hormone replacement therapy.

src: the clinical experience was a total of 12 weeks . groups were compared according to several variables including second semester exam scores , hesi scores , and quality and timeliness of clinical paperwork . over a two - year period , seventy - one undergraduate nursing students in the second semester medical - surgical nursing course participated .
bt: The clinical experience was a total of 12 weeks. The groups were compared according to several variables, including the results of the second semester exams, the results of nursing courses, and the quality and punctuality of the clinical documents.

src: we investigated erg protein expression in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca . erg expression was correlated with patients ' clinical outcome and several pathological parameters , including gleason score ( gs ) , pathological stage , surgical margin , and extra - capsular extension . erg expression was detected in 86/198 ( 43.4% ) patients exclusively in neoplastic epithelium .
bt: Erg protein expression was investigated in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca. erg expression was correlated with the clinical outcome of patients and several pathological parameters, including glacial score (gs), pathological stage, surgical margin, extra-capsular extension and patient age.

src: type ii acots fall into the ' hot dog ' fold superfamily . there are currently six human type ii genes ; however , two homologous proteins , thioesterase superfamily members 4 ( them4 ) and 5 ( them5 ) share common type ii structural features and , in the case of them4 , acyl - coa thioesterase activity -- suggesting that the family may be larger than previously realised . although recent studies have greatly expanded the current understanding of these proteins and their physiological importance , there are a number of members whose functions are relatively unexplored and which warrant further investigation .
bt: There are currently six human type ii genes; however, two homologous proteins, the members of the thioesterase superfamily 4 (them4) and 5 (them5), share common structural characteristics of type ii and, in the case of thios4, the activity of acyl-coa thioesterase - suggesting that the family may be larger than previously thought.

src: objectiveserine - threonine kinase stk11 catalyzes the amp - activated protein kinase complex . we tested the hypothesis that a gene variant in stk11 contributes to variation in insulin sensitivity and metformin efficacy.research design and methodswe studied the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism ( snp ) ( rs8111699 ) in stk11 on endocrine - metabolic and body composition indexes before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic girls with androgen excess , representing a continuum from prepuberal girls with a combined history of low birth weight and precocious pubarche over to postmenarchial girls with hyperinsulinemic ovarian hyperandrogenism . metformin was dosed at 425 mg / day in younger girls and 850 mg / day in older girls .
bt: The aim of the research was to study the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism (snp) (rs8111699) on endocrine-metabolic and body composition indexes before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic androgen-excess girls, and its possible relationship to additional genetic factors, representing a continuum of prepubescent girls with a combined history of low birth weight and early puberty in postmenarchial girls with hyperinsulinemic ovarian hyperandrogenism.

src: development of novel biomaterials for drug delivery which forms a part of the so called novel drug delivery systems has always been exhilarating . mechanical evaluation of polymer based topical gels , which would be subjected to load or stress during its application , is inevitable.rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and yielding . rheological modeling was also carried out.the viscosity and yield stress were inversely dependent on the eugenol concentration .
bt: The development of new biomaterials for drug administration that are part of the so-called new drug administration systems has always been exciting. Mechanical evaluation of topical gels based on polymers, which would be subject to load or stress during their application, is inevitable. Rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and performance, and temperature was also measured. Rheological modeling was also carried out.

src: parasite lactate dehydrogenase ( pldh ) is extensively employed as malaria rapid diagnostic tests ( rdts ) . moreover , it is a well - known drug target candidate . however , the genetic diversity of this gene might influence performance of rdt kits and its drug target candidacy .
bt: The parasite lactate dehydrogenase (pldh) is widely used as rapid malaria diagnosis tests (rdts). It is also a known target drug candidate. However, the genetic diversity of this gene could influence the performance of rdt kits and their target drug candidate, which may affect the accuracy of the results.

src: beryllium was released into the air from routine operations and three accidental fires at the rocky flats plant ( rfp ) in colorado from 1958 to 1989 . we evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of airborne concentrations and their uncertainties and calculated lifetime cancer risks and risks of chronic beryllium disease to hypothetical receptors . this article discusses exposure - response relationships for lung cancer and chronic beryllium disease .
bt: Beryllium was released into the air from routine operations and three accidental fires at the Rocky Floor Plant (rfp) in Colorado from 1958 to 1989. We evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of concentrations in the air and their uncertainties, and considered the effects of climate on beryllium dispersion, calculated lifelong cancer risks and chronic beryllium disease risks to hypothetical receptors.

src: in addition , all video - documented areas of peeling on the retinal surface were evaluated postoperatively using an additional focal 2 microperimetry . retinal sensitivity and bcva were correlated with morphological changes ( ez and elm ) in the foveal region and in regions of membrane peeling . overall , bcva increased from 0.6 ( 0.2 ) to 0.2 ( 0.2 ) logmar after 6 months with an increase in retinal sensitivity ( 17.9 2.7 db to 26.8 3.1 db , p < 0.01 ) .
bt: In addition, all areas documented by video peeling on the retina surface were evaluated postoperatively using an additional focal microperimetry 2. Retina sensitivity and bcva correlated with morphological changes (e.g. elm) in the foveal region and membrane peeling regions.

src: 45 male c57bl/6j mice ( mean weight 27 g ) were anesthetized with ketamine / xylazine . animals were subjected to a weight drop closed traumatic brain injury ( wd - tbi ) , a femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock ( fx - sh ) . animals were subdivided into wd - tbi , fx - sh and combined trauma ( co - tx ) groups .
bt: The animals were subjected to a closed traumatic brain weight loss (wd-tbi), a femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock (fx-sh), and a muscle injury (mus-l).

src: objectivea review of the literature on coccygectomy and our patients was performed to assess the effectiveness of coccygectomy for chronic refractory coccygodynia.methodsan english language pubmed search was conducted with the terms " coccygodynia " and " coccygectomy " from january 1980 to january 2012 . we retrospectively reviewed the medical records and performed telephone questionnaire on 61 patients who underwent coccygectomy at ucdmc between 1997 and 2009.resultsthere were 28 case series from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who underwent coccygectomy following failed conservative management . the mean age ranged from 26.4 to 52.8 years .
bt: A review of the literature on coccygectomy and our patients was conducted to assess the effectiveness of coccygectomy for chronic refractory coccygodynia. The objective English search was conducted with the terms "coccygodynia" and "coccygectomy" from January 1980 to January 2012. We retrospectively reviewed medical records and conducted a telephone questionnaire of 61 patients who underwent a coccygectomy at UCDMC between 1997 and 2009.

src: in the study area , pentachlorophenol and pentachlorophenol incineration sources have been identified , and the animal contamination and blood elevations probably reflect these sources . soil reference values and site - specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposures to contamination in home - produced animal products . such estimates can be verified with limited pcdd / pcdf sampling of animals and humans.imagesfigure 1figure 2
bt: In the study area, incineration sources of pentachlorofenol and pentachlorofenol have been identified, and animal pollution and blood levels are likely to reflect these sources.Soil reference values and site-specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposure to pollution in domestic animal products.These estimates can be verified with limited animal and human samples, as well as additional environmental analyses. imagesfigure 1figure 2

src: resistance to fluoroquinolones ( flq ) and second - line injectable drugs ( slid ) is steadily increasing , especially in eastern european countries , posing a serious threat to effective tuberculosis ( tb ) infection control and adequate patient management . the availability of rapid molecular tests for the detection of extensively drug - resistant tb ( xdr - tb ) is critical in areas with high rates of multidrug - resistant tb ( mdr - tb ) and xdr - tb and limited conventional drug susceptibility testing ( dst ) capacity . we conducted a multicenter study to evaluate the performance of the new version ( v2.0 ) of the genotype mtbdrsl assay compared to phenotypic dst and sequencing on a panel of 228 mycobacterium tuberculosis isolates and 231 smear - positive clinical specimens .
bt: The availability of rapid molecular testing for the detection of extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (xdr-TB) is critical in areas with high rates of multidrug-resistant tuberculosis (mdr-TB) and xdr-TB and limited capacity for testing for susceptibility to conventional medicines (dst), which significantly affects early treatment and disease management.

src: we report the rare case of an 83-year - old caucasian male affected by a giant cholesteatoma that eroded the labyrinth and the posterior fossa dura and extended to the infralabyrinthine region , going beyond the theca and reaching the first cervical vertebra . the giant cholesteatoma was managed through a combined approach ( microscopic and , subsequently , complementary endoscopic approach ) . in this case report , we illustrate some advantages of this surgical choice .
bt: We reported the rare case of an 83-year-old Caucasian male affected by a giant cholesterol that eroded the labyrinth and the posterior hard fossa and spread to the infralabyrinthine region, passing beyond the teak and reaching the first cervical vertebra.

src: purposethe purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external snapping hip.materials and methodsbetween september 2011 and june 2013 , we evaluated 7 patients ( 10 cases ) with snapping hip who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months . two patients ( 4 cases ) were impossible to adduct both knees in 90of hip flexion . surgery was done in lateral decubitus position , under spinal anesthesia .
bt: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external hip.materials materials and methods between September 2011 and June 2013, we evaluated 7 patients (10 cases) with hip who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months. Additionally, two patients (4 cases) were unable to adduce both knees at 90 hip flexion.

src: introductiondiagnosis of peritoneal tuberculosis ( ptb ) is difficult , even in developed countries , where data are lacking . the aim of the present study was to describe the clinical presentation , diagnosis , and bacterial epidemiology of ptb in france over a 10-year period.methodsa retrospective study was conducted on ptb in two university hospitals in france , between january 2004 and december 2014.resultsamong the 34 patients , 76.5% were migrants from areas of endemic tuberculosis ( tb ) , mainly africa . the main presentation ( 85.3% ) was a checkup of ascites or suspicion of peritoneal carcinomatosis .
bt: The objective of this study was to describe the clinical presentation, diagnosis and bacterial epidemiology of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB) in France over a 10-year period. The retrospective study method was conducted in ptb at two university hospitals in France between January 2004 and December 2014. The results among 34 patients, 76.5% were migrants from endemic tuberculosis (TB) areas, mainly from Africa.

src: six months later , due to persistence of symptoms , the patient underwent a high resolution esophageal manometry ( hrem ) demonstrating jackhammer esophagus . the patient was treated with a high dose proton pump inhibitor but without resolution of her symptoms . during the last year , the patient reported repeated episodes of food regurgitation and a significant weight loss .
bt: Six months later, due to the persistence of symptoms, the patient underwent a high-resolution esophageal manometry (hrem) that demonstrated the hammer esophagus. The patient was treated with a high dose of proton pump inhibitor but without resolution of her symptoms.

src: the failure to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a lower rate of retinal reattachment , worse final visual acuity , and a higher rate of re - operation ( p = 0.002 , p = 0.02 , and p = 0.002 , respectively ) . the location of the identified retinal break was more common in the superotemporal quadrant than in the other quadrants.conclusionsthe inability to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a poor final outcome . other factors were less important for the functional and anatomic success in patients with pseudophakic rds .
bt: The inability to identify a retinal rupture during surgery was associated with a lower rate of retinal reattachment, worse final visual acuity, and a higher reoperation rate (p = 0.002, p = 0.02 and p = 0.002 respectively).

src: we reviewed a cohort of patients with previously untreated locoregional advanced head and neck squamous cell carcinoma ( hnscc ) who received a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen . retrospective review was performed of 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at greater baltimore medical center from 2000 to 2007 . radiation included 125 cgy twice daily for a total 70 gy to the primary site .
bt: We reviewed a cohort of patients with advanced head and neck squamous cell (hnscc) loca-regional advanced cell carcinoma who had not been treated previously and who received a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen. A retrospective review of 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at Greater Baltimore Medical Center from 2000 to 2007 included 125 cgy twice daily for a total of 70 gy to the main site and side effects were monitored during treatment.

src: liver metastases from colorectal carcinoma commonly form nodular lesions in the liver parenchyma . we report a case of liver metastasis from rectal adenocarcinoma that extended predominantly into the bile duct . a 62-year - old japanese man underwent low anterior resection for rectal adenocarcinoma 9 years ago .
bt: Liver metastases of colorectal cancer commonly form lumps in the hepatic parenchyma. We reported a case of hepatic metastasis of rectal adenocarcinoma that spread predominantly to the bile duct and lymphatic system. A 62-year-old Japanese man underwent a previous low resection for rectal adenocarcinoma 9 years ago.

src: drug - eluting stents ( des ) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary artery disease when percutaneous intervention ( pci ) is feasible . however , stent thrombosis seems to occur more frequently with des and occasionally is associated with resistance to anti - platelet drugs . we have experienced a case of recurrent stent thrombosis in a patient with clopidogrel resistance .
bt: - drug detection stents (des) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary disease when percutaneous intervention (PCI) is feasible. however, stent thrombosis appears to occur more frequently with DES and is occasionally associated with resistance to antiplatelet medicines.

src: the mean hemoglobin level of the 25 patients at baseline was 9.6 g / dl ( median , 9.9 g / dl ; range , 6.9 g / dl 10.9 g / dl ) . the mean change in hemoglobin level for the 15 patients who completed at least 9 treatments was 1.7 g / dl ( median , 1.1 g / dl ; range , 1.9 g / dl to 3.2 g / dl ) ; it reached 2.1 g / dl ( median , 1.3 g / dl ; range , 0.2 g / dl to 4.6 g / dl ; p = 0.0007 ) for the 14 patients who completed all 12 weekly treatments . five ( 20.0% ) patients were transfused and considered as treatment failures .
bt: The mean haemoglobin level of the 25 patients at the starting point was 9.6 g / dl (median , 9.9 g / dl; range , 6.9 g / dl 10.9 g / dl). the mean change in haemoglobin level of the 15 patients who completed at least 9 treatments was 1.7 g / dl (median , 1.1 g / dl; range , 1.9 g / dl to 3.2 g / dl); reached 2.1 g / dl (median , 1.3 g / dl; range , 0.2 g / dl to 4.6 g / dl; p = 0.0007 ) for the 14 patients who completed the 12 weekly treatments .

src: overall 86.9% of respondents felt that the proposed hierarchical nature of injuries was appropriate , and 77.8% of respondents agreed that that the risk of neurologic injury is highest in a vertical fracture through the foramen . almost 80% of respondents felt that the separation of injuries based on the integrity of l5s1 facet was appropriate , and 83.8% of surgeons agreed that a nondisplaced sacral u fracture is a clinically relevant entity . conclusion this study determines the global perspective on controversial areas in the injury patterns of sacral fractures and demonstrates that the development of a comprehensive and universally accepted sacral classification is possible .
bt: 86.9% of respondents considered the hierarchical nature of the proposed lesions to be appropriate, and 77.8% of respondents agreed that the risk of neurological injury is greater in a vertical fracture through the foramen. Overall, nearly 80% of respondents considered injury separation based on l5s1 facet integrity to be appropriate, and 83.8% of surgeons agreed that an undisplaced sacral fracture is a clinically relevant entity.

src: the metsy was defined according to the revised national cholesterol education program third adult treatment panel . all probable predictive models and their predictive performance were provided using leave - one - out cross - validated logistic regression and the receiver operation characteristic curve methods . multiple linear regression was performed to assess factors associated with the cmetsys.the study population consisted of 8313 persons ( 49.9% male , mean age 38.54 15.86 years ) .
bt: Metsy was defined according to the revised National Cholesterol Education Program of the Third Adult Treatment Panel.All probable predictive models and their predictive performance were provided using permit-validated logistic regression - one - and the characteristic curve methods of receptor operation. Multiple linear regression was performed to evaluate factors associated with cmetsys.

src: introductioncare coordination is an important aspect of nursing care especially for elderly patients admitted to an acute care setting . in singapore care coordination and transitional care nursing is a new concept of care nevertheless important but unexplored.aim/objectivesthe objective of this paper is to explore the characteristics of elderly patients receiving care coordination , determine care gaps and intervention during home visit and telephonic review.research design and samplinga designed questionnaire was used to collect information on the patient s demography , social and clinical profile and determine post discharge activities using eric coleman s four pillars tool . a pilot study of ten questionnaires was conducted .
bt: In Singapore, care coordination and transition care is a new concept of care, however important but not explored. The aim of this paper is to explore the characteristics of older patients receiving care coordination, determine care gaps and intervention during home visit and telephone review. A research design and a sample-designed questionnaire were used to collect information about patient demography, social and clinical profile and determine post-discharge using the four-pillar tool of Eric Coleman's activities. A pilot study with fifteen questionnaires was conducted.

src: fundamental problems with personality disorders ( pd ) diagnostic system in the previous version of dsm , led to the revision of dsm . therefore , a multidimensional system has been proposed for diagnosis of personality disorder features in dsm-5 . in the dimensional approach of dsm-5 , personality disorders diagnosis is based on levels of personality functioning ( criteria a ) and personality trait domains ( criteria b).the purpose of this study was firstly , to examine the dsm-5 levels of personality functioning in antisocial and borderline personality disorders , and second , to explore which levels of personality functioning in patients with antisocial and borderline personality disorders can better predicted severity than others.this study had a cross sectional design .
bt: In the DSM-5 dimensional approach, the diagnosis of personality disorders is based on the levels of personality functioning (criteria a) and the domains of personality traits (criteria b). The purpose of this study was, first, to examine the levels of DSM-5 personality functioning in antisocial and borderline personality disorders, and, second, to explore which levels of personality functioning in patients with antisocial and borderline personality disorders can better predict severity than others, and how these levels affect recovery.

src: based on a 28-day survival , the sepsis was further divided into the survivors ' and nonsurvivors ' groups . serum strem-1 , scd163 , pct , crp , and wbc counts were tested on days 1 , 3 , 5 , 7 , 10 , and 14 . on the icu admission , the sepsis group displayed higher levels of strem-1 , scd163 , pct , and crp than the sirs group ( p < 0.05 ) .
bt: Based on a 28-day survival, sepsis was divided into groups of survivors and non-survivors. Serum counts of strem-1, scd163, pct, crp, and wbc were tested on days 1, 3, 5, 7, 10, and 14.

src: chromosome 22q13.3 deletion syndrome is a well - recognized cause of global developmental delay , while duplication of the same chromosome is a rare occurrence . the presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported , to our knowledge . we report a rare occurrence of 22q13.3 duplication and 22q13.3 deletion in siblings , as a consequence of a mother 's inversion on her 22nd chromosome ( p13;q13.32 ) .
bt: The 22q13.3 chromosome deletion syndrome is a well-recognized cause of delay in global development, while the duplication of the same chromosome is a rare occurrence. The presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported, to our knowledge.

bt: In the rb group, 14 patients (93.3%) had cad (p< 0.001) and 13 patients (86.7%) had ami (p< 0.001). In terms of cad type and reversibility of avb, 13/15 (86.7%) patients with ami, 0/2 (0%) of unstable angina, and 1/41 (2.4%) of stable angina had reversible avb.

bt: In total, 83 polymorphic alleles were found (6.91 alleles per locus). In addition, the peak variation from 0.52 to 0.9 was calculated.

src: maternal - fetal genotype combinations at these loci are hypothesized to have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy which can affect fetal neurodevelopment and increase schizophrenia susceptibility . this article reviews maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility studies and schizophrenia and discusses the hypothesized biological role of these incompatibility genes . it concludes that research is needed to further elucidate the role of rhd and hla - b maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an adverse prenatal environment through a maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility mechanism .
bt: Maternal-fetal genotype combinations at these sites are assumed to have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy that may affect fetal neurodevelopment and increase susceptibility to schizophrenia. This article reviews studies of maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility and schizophrenia and discusses the hypothetical biological role of these incompatibility genes. It concludes that research is needed to further clarify the role of maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce a prenatal environment through a mechanism of maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility.

src: the aim of this study was to evaluate clinical characteristics , prognostic factors , survival rates , and treatment modalities in patients with primary gastric lymphoma ( pgl ) . we retrospectively reviewed and analyzed data from patients treated for pgl in our clinic from 1998 through 2010 . staging was performed using the lugano staging system .
bt: The aim of this study was to evaluate clinical characteristics, prognostic factors, survival rates, treatment modalities and psychological impact in patients with primary gastric lymphoma (PGL).

bt: Symptomatic trigeminal neuralgia due to a brainstem infarction is said to be rare. However, facial pain is not uncommon in Wallenberg syndrome.

src: the factors affecting the correlation between parkinson disease ( pd ) and depression have remained unclear.we assessed the prevalence of depression among patients with pd and the association between pd - related variables and depression severity.this is a cross - sectional study performed in kermanshah province of iran . sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria . patients with confirmed parkinson disease who were referred to clinics of kermanshah university of medical sciences participated in this study .
bt: The factors affecting the correlation between Parkinson's disease (pd) and depression remain unclear. We assessed the prevalence of depression among patients with pd and the association between variables related to pd and the severity of depression. This is a cross-sectional study conducted in the Iranian province of Kermanshah. The sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria.

bt: Elisa and flow cytometry were performed to verify the binding activity of immunotoxin antigens (scfv2a9-pe or ape) with epcam.

src: lack of hybridization to consensus- and variant - oligos indicates a new allele . detection of unknown variants in heterozygous samples depends upon fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homozygous samples generate twice the amount of signal . this method can identify unknown snp in heterozygous conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and specificity of 90% .
bt: Detection of unknown variants in heterozygous samples depends on fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homozygous samples generate twice the amount of signal.This method can identify unknown SNP under heterozygous conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and a specificity of 90%, which is crucial for diagnostic accuracy.

src: american trypanosomiasis or chagas disease is a debilitating disease representing an important social problem that affects , approximately , 10 million people in the world . the main aggravating factor of this situation is the lack of an effective drug to treat the different stages of this disease . in this context , the search for trypanocidal substances isolated from plants , synthetic or semi synthetic molecules , is an important strategy .
bt: Trypanosomiasis or Chagas disease is a debilitating American disease that represents a major social problem affecting approximately 10 million people worldwide. The main aggravating factor of this situation is the lack of an effective drug to treat the different stages of this disease.

src: of the 168 participants , 31.0% were classified as normal weight ( bmi = 18.524.9 kg / m2 ) , 36.3% were classified as overweight ( bmi = 25.029.9 kg / m2 ) , and 32.7% were classified as obese , classes i and ii ( bmi = 3039.9 kg / m2 ) . there were no significant differences among bmi groups on t25fw and 6mw , cw , spatiotemporal gait parameters , msws-12 , or daily step and movement counts . the prevalence of overweight and obesity in this sample was almost 70% , but there was not a consistent nor significant impact of bmi on outcomes of mobility .
bt: Of the 168 participants, 31.0% were classified as normal weight (bmi = 18.524.9 kg/m2), 36.3% were classified as overweight (bmi = 25.029.9 kg/m2), and 32.7% were classified as obese, class I and II (bmi = 3039.9 kg/m2). There were no significant differences between bmi groups in spacewalk parameters, MSWS-12, or daily count of steps and movements.

src: triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato ( s.l . ) , the main vector of chagas disease in northeastern brazil , is a species complex comprising four species , one with two subspecies ( t. brasiliensis brasiliensis , t. brasiliensis macromelasoma , t. juazeirensis , t. sherlocki , and t. melanica ) , and each taxon displaying distinct ecological requirements . in order to evaluate the genetic relationships among nine t. brasiliensis s.l .
bt: Triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato (s.l.), the main vector of Chagas disease in northeastern Brazil, is a species complex comprising four species, one with two subspecies (t. brasiliensis brasiliensis, t. brasiliensis macromelasoma, t. juazeirensis, t. sherlocki and t. melanica) and each taxon showing different ecological requirements.

src: skin - lightening is an aesthetic practice of global concern . by adopting a biopsycho - social approach , we consider the interplay between the biological , psychological and social factors that underpin the circulation and consumption of skin lighteners in south africa . this paper reflects on biological aspects of skin lightening , interpersonal relationships , individual beliefs and expectations about the maintenance of health and well being that informs cosmetic practices .
bt: Skin lightening is an aesthetic practice of global interest. By adopting a biopsycho-social approach, we consider the interaction between the biological, psychological and social factors that underpin the circulation and consumption of skin lighters in South Africa. This article reflects on the biological aspects of skin lightening, interpersonal relationships, individual beliefs and expectations about health and well-being that inform cosmetic practices and their economic impact.

src: similar codes were grouped into categories , and broader themes were developed from these categories . four themes were identified : social network and relationships ; interactions with agencies ; recognition of role ; and time for oneself . by identifying what affects carers ' quality of life , an appropriate choice can be made when selecting instruments for future carer research .
bt: Four themes were identified: social networks and relationships; interactions with agencies; recognition of role; and time for oneself. By identifying what affects caregivers' quality of life, appropriate choices can be made when selecting tools for future caregiver research.

src: pancreatic cell failure leads to diabetes development . during disease progression , cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate the elevated glycaemia and the peripheral insulin resistance . this compensatory mechanism involves a fine - tuned regulation to modulate the endoplasmic reticulum ( er ) capacity and quality control to prevent unfolded proinsulin accumulation , a major protein synthetized within the cell .
bt: During disease progression, cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate for elevated glucose and peripheral insulin resistance. This compensatory mechanism involves tight regulation to modulate the capacity and quality control of the endoplasmic reticulum (ER) to prevent the accumulation of proinsulin, an important protein synthesized within the cell and crucial for glycemic homeostasis.

src: mitochondrial genomes often contain large amounts of plastid dna ( ptdna)-derived sequences ( mtpts ) . it has been suggested that the intercompartmental transfer of ptdna is greatly reduced in species with only a single plastid per cell ( monoplastidic ) as compared with those with many plastids per cell ( polyplastidic ) . this hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of dna from plastids to mitochondria .
bt: Mitochondrial genomes often contain large amounts of platelet-derived DNA sequences (ptdna) (mtpts). It has been suggested that intercompartmental platelet DNA transfer is very reduced in species with only one platelet per cell (monoplastidical) compared to those with many platelet per cell (polyplasticized). This hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of DNA from platelets to mitochondria and this has limited our understanding of the process.

src: many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine . however , the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been compared in one study . this study aimed at investigating the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel , a thyroid hormone cream and a silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of skin wounds surgically induced in wistar rats for determining the treatment of choice .
bt: Many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera, thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine. However, the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well known and have not been compared in a single study. This study aimed to investigate the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel, a thyroid hormone cream and a silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of surgically induced skin wounds in wistar rats to determine the treatment of choice and its impact on the rapid recovery of wounds.

src: two groups of prosthesis had been implanted : harris - galante ii ( hgii ) in 15 and versys - trilogy ( v - t ) in 37 hips , both from zimmer company . the patients were assessed clinically , radiographically and with harris hip score , sf36 , womac , and mactar questionnaires , with 65 months ( 26 - 136 ) mean follow-up.all the v - t prostheses had survived well . eight of hg ii were revised by the last follow - up in 19 - 102 months .
bt: Two groups of prosthetic implants had been implanted: harris - two galante ii (hgii) at 15 and versys - trilogy (v - t) at 37 hips, both from the zimmer company. patients were evaluated clinically, x-ray and using harris, sf36 , womac and mactar hip score questionnaires, with an average follow-up of 65 months (26 - 136).All v - t prosthetics had survived well.

src: a latent content analysis was used to explore the characteristics and dynamics of social and sexual relationships.resultswe found dominant masculine ideals characterised by overt economic power and multiple sexual partners . reasons for large concurrent sexual networks were the perception that women were too empowered , could not be trusted , and lack of control over women . existing masculine norms encourage concurrent sexual networks , ignoring the high risk of hiv transmission .
bt: We used latent content analysis to explore the characteristics and dynamics of social and sexual relationships. We found dominant male ideals characterized by open economic power and multiple sexual partners. The reasons for the large concurrent sexual networks were the perception that women were too empowered, could not be trusted, and lack of control over them. Existing male norms encourage concurrent sexual networks, ignoring the high risk of HIV transmission.

bt: An increased level of this cytokine was also found in obese patients suffering from t2dm. A positive correlation was present between il-6 and tnf- and adiponectin levels. only the level of il-6 was correlated with serum crp concentration. Study findings confirmed that increased inflammatory cytokines lead to persistence of inflammation in obese subjects.

src: introductionthe spleen is a highly vascular organ and is in close proximity to many potential primary sites such as the stomach , breast , pancreas and colon . it is however an unusual site for metastatic disease . the reasons for this are not fully understood at the present time .
bt: The spleen is a highly vascular organ and is in close proximity to many potential primary sites such as the stomach, chest, pancreas, and colon. However, it is an unusual site for metastatic disease. The reasons for this are not fully understood at this time.

src: it is known that the brain adaptively recalibrates itself to small ( 100 ms ) auditory visual ( av ) temporal asynchronies so as to maintain intersensory temporal coherence . here we explored whether spatial disparity between a sound and light affects av temporal recalibration . participants were exposed to a train of asynchronous av stimulus pairs ( sound - first or light - first ) with sounds and lights emanating from either the same or a different location .
bt: It is known that the brain adaptively recalibrates to small temporal auditory visual asynchronous av to maintain intersensory temporal coherence. Here we explore whether the spatial disparity between a sound and light affects temporal recalibration. Participants were exposed to a train of pairs of asynchronous av (sound - first or light - first) stimuli with sounds and lights emanating from the same or a different place, and this can influence how we perceive time differently.

src: three - way anova was used to compare the factors implant length , crown height , and implant system ( = 0.05 ) . the results showed that implant length was a statistically significant factor for both axial and nonaxial loading . the 13 mm prosthetic crown did not result in statistically significant differences in stress distribution between the implant systems and implant lengths studied , regardless of load type ( p > 0.05 ) .
bt: The 13 mm prosthetic crown did not result in statistically significant differences in the stress distribution between the implant systems and the implant lengths studied, regardless of the type of load (p > 0,05), although the results suggest a trend towards increased stress in the longer implant systems.

src: head and neck squamous cell carcinomas are among the most common neoplasms worldwide and characterized by local tumor aggressiveness , high rate of early recurrences , development of metastasis , and second primary cancers . despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management , overall survival - rates remained largely unchanged over the last decades . thus , the need for novel treatment options for this tumor entity is undeniable .
bt: Head and neck squamous cell carcinomas are among the most common neoplasms worldwide and are characterized by local tumor aggressiveness, a high rate of early recurrence, the development of metastases and primary secondary cancers. Despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management, overall survival rates have remained largely unchanged over the past few decades.

src: for this purpose , formalin - fixed and paraffin - embedded sections obtained from 15 normal ( at autopsy ) donors and 12 men with prostate cancer were analyzed by immunohistochemistry . about 40% of both normal and tumor prostate samples resulted spanx positive . signals were exclusively within the nucleus in normal prostate cells , whereas both nuclear and cytoplasmic positivity was observed in tumor cells .
bt: For this purpose, immunohistochemical analysis of formalin-fixed and paraffin-incrusted sections obtained from 15 normal donors (in autopsy) and 12 men with prostate cancer was performed. Approximately 40% of normal prostate and tumor samples were positive.

src: in the latest year , and also in 2013 , salmonella was the most frequently detected causative agent in foodborne outbreaks ( fbos ) reported in europe . as indicated in efsa report ( 2015 ) the serotypes mostly associated to fbos are s. typhimurium and enteritidis ; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with the consumption of contaminated pork and beef , fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are linked to eggs and poultry meat . in this study it is described the investigation of a domestic fbo involving four adults and linked to homemade lasagne .
bt: In the last year, and also in 2013, salmonella was the most frequently detected causative agent in foodborne outbreaks (fbos) reported in Europe. As indicated in the efsa (2015) report, the serotypes most associated with fbos are s. typhimurium and enteritidis; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with consumption of contaminated pork and beef, fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are linked to eggs and poultry meat.

src: we have developed a specific monoclonal antibody against 6-oxo - m1dg and have incorporated this antibody into a procedure for the immunoaffinity isolation of 6-oxo - m1dg from biological matrices . the purified analyte is quantified by lc - ms / ms using a stable isotope - labeled analogue ( [ 15n5]-6-oxo - m1dg ) as an internal standard . healthy male sprague dawley rats excreted 6-oxo - m1dg at a rate of 3501893 fmol / kgd in feces .
bt: We developed a specific monoclonal antibody against 6-oxo - m1dg and incorporated this antibody into a procedure for isolating the immunoaffinity of 6-oxo - m1dg from biological matrices. The purified analyte is quantified by lc - ms / ms using a stable analogue labeled by isotope ([15n5]-6-oxo - m1dg ] as the internal standard. Healthy male spragragragragrag rat excreted 6-oxo - m1dg at a rate of 3501893 fmol / kgd in the stool and this is used to monitor treatment effectiveness.

src: the analyses were repeated using the national equations . both the atlantic and the national equations yielded corrected obesity estimates that were significantly more accurate than those based on self - report . the results provide some evidence of the generalizability of the national equations to atypical regions of canada .
bt: The analyses were repeated using national equations. Both the Atlantic and national equations revealed correct estimates of obesity that were significantly more accurate than self-reported ones, and this was verified by comparison with medical data.

src: in consequence , each agonist muscle fiber is stimulated by an agonist neuron , while an antagonist muscle fiber is unstimulated by a pause and step from the antagonist neuron . it is concluded that the neural network is constrained by a minimum duration of the agonist pulse and that the most dominant factor in determining the saccade magnitude is the number of active neurons for the small saccades . for the large saccades , however , the duration of agonist burst firing significantly affects the control of saccades .
bt: Consequently, each agonist muscle fiber is stimulated by an agonist neuron, while an antagonist muscle fiber is not stimulated by a pause and step of the antagonist neuron. It is concluded that the neural network is limited by a minimum duration of the agonist pulse and that the most dominant factor in determining the magnitude of the pulse is the number of active neurons for the small pulses, which significantly affects the accuracy of muscle movement.

src: nearly , 50% of the patients were farmers , 30% businessmen and 20% were civil servant . 7 ( 70% ) of these patients presented with fournier 's gangrene within 4 weeks of development of fistula - in - ano and the rest within 8 weeks . 4 ( 40% ) of these patients had inadequate drainage of their perianal abscess and 2 ( 20% ) had incision and drainage .
bt: 50% of the patients were farmers, 30% were businessmen and 20% were public officials. 7 (70%) of these patients developed Fournier gangrene within 4 weeks of fistula development in the anus and the rest within 8 weeks. 4 (40%) of these patients had insufficient drainage from their perianal abscess and 2 (20%) had incision and drainage, and 10 (10%) did not present any complications.

src: using 64-channel multidetector row computed tomographic angiography ( mdcta ) , we evaluated morphological features of the major systemic vessels in micropigs and compared our results to published human data . the main vasculature of the animals was similar to that of humans , except for the iliac arterial system . however , diameters of the major systemic vessels were significantly different between micropigs and humans .
bt: Using a 64-channel computed tomographic angiography (mdcta) in rows of multiple detectors, we evaluated the morphological characteristics of the main systemic vessels in micro-dogs and compared our results with published human data.

src: for human and mouse , the lncrna numbers are 167,150 and 130,558 , respectively . noncode 2016 has also introduced three important new features : ( i ) conservation annotation ; ( ii ) the relationships between lncrnas and diseases ; and ( iii ) an interface to choose high - quality datasets through predicted scores , literature support and long - read sequencing method support . noncode is also accessible through http://www.noncode.org/.
bt: In the case of humans and mice, lncrna numbers are 167.150 and 130.558, respectively. noncode 2016 also introduced three important new features: (i) conservation annotation; (ii) the relationships between lncrna and disease; and (iii) an interface to choose high-quality datasets through predicted scores, literary support and long-reading sequencing method support. noncode can also be accessed through http://www.noncode.org/, making it easier for researchers to access information.

src: essential palatal tremor ( ept ) is a rare disorder which shows rhythmic involuntary movement of the muscles of soft palate , especially tensor veli palatini muscle . ept is classified by two subtypes , which is primary and secondary ept . secondary ept includes psychogenic type .
bt: Essential palatine tremor (ept) is a rare disorder that shows involuntary rhythmic movements of the soft palate muscles, especially the tensor veli palatini muscle. ept is classified by two subtypes, which are primary and secondary ept, and generally affects older adults more.

src: atlantic correction equations were developed in the mhw subsample . using separate multiple regression models for men and women , self - reported body mass index ( bmi ) was corrected by multiplying the self - reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model intercept . paired t - tests were used to determine whether corrected mean bmi values were significantly more accurate ( i.e. , closer to measured data ) than the equivalent means based on self - reported data .
bt: Atlantic correction equations were developed in the mhw subsample. Using separate multiple regression models for men and women, the self-reported body mass index (bmi) was corrected by multiplying the self-reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model interceptor. T-pair tests were used to determine whether the corrected bmi mean values were significantly more accurate (i.e., closer to the measured data) than the equivalent meanings based on self-reported data and direct measurements.

src: granulocyte macrophage - colony stimulating factor ( gm - csf ) is a hematopoietic growth factor , which stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells . in autoimmune and inflammatory diseases , th17 cells have been considered as strong inducers of tissue inflammation . however , recent evidence indicates that gm - csf has prominent proinflammatory functions and that this growth factor ( not il-17 ) is critical for the pathogenicity of cd4 + t cells .
bt: The macrophage of macrophocytes - colony stimulating factor (gm-csf) is a hematopoietic growth factor, which stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophocytes from bone marrow precursor cells. In autoimmune and inflammatory diseases, Th17 cells have been considered to be strong inducers of tissue inflammation. However, recent evidence indicates that gm-csf has prominent pro-inflammatory functions and that this growth factor (not IL-17) is critical for the pathogenicity of CD4+ T cells and also plays a crucial role in regulating the immune system.

src: the initial step of atrioventricular ( av ) valve development involves the deposition of extracellular matrix ( ecm ) components of the endocardial cushion and the endocardialmesenchymal transition . while the appropriately regulated expression of the major ecm components , versican and hyaluronan , that form the endocardial cushion is important for heart valve development , the underlying mechanism that regulates ecm gene expression remains unclear . we found that zebrafish crip2 expression is restricted to a subset of cells in the av canal ( avc ) endocardium at 55 hours post - fertilization ( hpf ) .
bt: The first step in the development of the atrioventricular valve (av) involves the deposition of extracellular components of the endocardial cushion matrix (ecm) and the endocardial-mesenchymal transition. While adequately regulated expression of the main components of the ECM valve, versican and hyaluronan, which form the endocardial cushion, is important for the development of the heart valve, the underlying mechanism regulating the ECM gene expression remains uncertain.

src: leonurus cardiaca , commonly known as motherwort , is a member of the lamiaceae family . it has a number of interesting biological activities , for example , sedative and hypotensive , antioxidant , anti - inflammatory , and antimicrobial activities . the aim of the present study was to investigate the effect of alcoholic extract of aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on nociceptive response using formalin , tail flick , and hot plate tests in mice .
bt: The aim of this study was to investigate the effect of the alcoholic extract of the aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on the nociceptive response by using formalin, tail slipping and hot plate testing in mice and internal organ activity.

src: peripheral osteomas of jaw bone are uncommon and usually associated with gardner 's syndrome . histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma . patient was reviewed after one year and was asymptomatic with no recurrence of the lesion .
bt: Peripheral jaw bone osteomas are uncommon and generally associated with Gardner syndrome. The histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma. The patient was examined after a year and was asymptomatic without recurrence of the injury, and this showed no significant change in his overall condition.

src: carcinoid bronchopulmonary tumors represent approximately 25% of all carcinoid tumors and 1%2% of all lung neoplasms . the most common symptoms are : persistent cough , asthma - like wheezing , chest pain , dyspnea , hemoptysis and obstructive pneumonitis . we present a case of a young adult diagnosed with a typical carcinoid tumor .
bt: Carcinoid bronchopulmonary tumors account for about 25% of all carcinoid tumors and 1%2% of all lung neoplasms. The most common symptoms are: persistent cough, asthma-like breathing, chest pain, dyspnea, hemoptysis, obstructive pneumonitis and chronic fatigue.

src: matrix metalloproteinase-9 ( mmp-9 ) , regulated by tissue inhibitor of metalloproteinase-9 ( timp-1 ) and the extracellular matrix metalloproteinase inducer ( emmprin ) , contributes to plaque instability . autologous stem cells from bone marrow ( mbmc ) treatment are suggested to reduce myocardial damage ; however , limited data exists on the influence of mbmc on mmps . we investigated the influence of mbmc on circulating levels of mmp-9 , timp-1 , and emmprin at different time points in patients included in the randomized autologous stem - cell transplantation in acute myocardial infarction ( astami ) trial ( n = 100 ) .
bt: It is suggested that autologous bone marrow treatment stem cells (mbmc) reduce myocardial damage; however, there is limited data on the influence of mbmc on mmps. Additionally, we investigated the influence of mbmc on circulating levels of mmp-9, timp-1 and emmprin at different times in patients included in the random autologous myocardial infarction (asthma) stem cell transplant trial (n = 100).

src: in the closed structure of the p2x cation channel , three -helical transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely : in rat p2x2 receptors , these intersect at thr339 . replacing thr339 by lysine in one , two or three subunits progressively increased chloride permeability and reduced unitary conductance . this implies that the closed - open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits , and that thr339 from each contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeation pathway .
bt: In the closed structure of the p2x cation channel, three helical transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely: in p2x2 receptors of rats, these intersect in thr339. By replacing thr339 with lysine in one, two or three subunits, progressively increasing the permeability of chloride and reducing unit conductivity, a significant change in the function of the channel is observed. This implies that the closed-open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits, and that thr339 of each contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeability pathway.

src: mmp-9 and emmprin were significantly correlated to myocardial injury ( ck : p = 0.005 and p < 0.001 , resp . ) and infarct size ( spect : p = 0.018 and p = 0.008 , resp . ) . the results indicate that the regulation of metalloproteinases is important during ami , however , limited influenced by mbmc .
bt: mmp-9 and emmprin were significantly correlated with myocardial injury (ck: p = 0.005 and p < 0.001 respectively) and heart attack size (spect: p = 0.018 and p = 0.008 respectively) and heart disease severity.

src: during the follow - up period , 3.4% of the participants had an appropriate response to only nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drugs , 57.6% to sulfasalazine , 26.3% to addition of methotrexate to the previous regimen , and 12.7% to biological agents . multiple logistic regression results showed that the underlying disease had a significant effect on the sulfasalazine response . the odds for response to treatment was 3.53 times higher in uspa patients compared to other patients ( odds ratio = 3.53 , 95% confidence interval : 1.637.68 , p=0.001 ) .
bt: During the follow-up period, 3.4% of participants had an adequate response to only non-steroidal anti-inflammatory medicines, 57.6% to sulfasalazine, 26.3% to methotrexate addition to the previous regimen, and 12.7% to biological agents. During multiple logistical regression results they showed that the underlying disease had a significant effect on sulfasalazine response.

src: recently , management of ludwig 's angina has evolved from aggressive airway management into a more conservative one . this is based on close airway observation on a specialised airway unit and a serial clinical airway assessment . improved imaging modalities , antibiotic therapy , surgical skills , and clinical experience are the key factors behind this change in practice .
bt: Recently, management of ludwig angina has evolved from aggressive airway management to a more conservative one. This is based on close airway observation in a specialized airway unit and a clinical assessment of the airways in series.

src: exacerbation definition was standardized . patients were divided into two groups , ie , d ( anticholinergics discontinued at randomization , previously prescribed ) and nd ( anticholinergics not discontinued , not previously prescribed).demographics were balanced between the d ( n = 5846 ) and nd ( n = 6317 ) groups , except for higher cumulative smoking ( 56 pack - years versus 48 pack - years ) , lower forced expiratory volume in one second ( fev1)/forced vital capacity ( 43% versus 48% ) , and lower baseline fev1 ( 35.8% predicted versus 42.4% predicted ) in the d group . in both groups , tiotropium reduced the risk for an exacerbation ( hazard ratio [ hr ] = 0.83 , p < 0.0001 [ d ] versus 0.79 , p < 0.0001 [ nd ] ) and a hospitalized exacerbation ( hr = 0.85 , p = 0.0467 versus 0.79 , p = 0.0094 ) .
bt: The definition of acceleration was standardized. Patients were divided into two groups, namely d (anticholinergics interrupted in randomization, previously prescribed) and nd (anticholinergics uninterrupted, not previously prescribed). Demographic data were balanced between groups d (n = 5846) and nd (n = 6317), except for the highest cumulative smoking (56 packets - years versus 48 packets - years), lower forced expiration volume per second (FEV1) / forced vital capacity (43% versus 48%), lower baseline FEV1 (foreseen 8% versus 42.4% foreseen) in group d.

src: in the 3d method of treatment , three - dimensional images from computer tomography were used . in treatment plans performed using the 2d method , images from the simulator were used.resultsthe comparison of treatment plans made by using 2d and 3d methods is described . this comparison highlighted the significant differences between these two methods assessing reference dose coverage of the ptv by 100% and 85% isodose.conclusionsreference doses with 100% coverage of the ptv in treatment applied with the 3d method are 31% higher than when applied with the 2d method .
bt: The treatment plans carried out with the 2d method used simulator images. The comparison of treatment plans carried out using the 2d and 3d methods is described. This comparison highlighted the significant differences between these two methods that assess the reference dose coverage of ptv at 100% and 85% isodose. Conclusion: The reference doses with 100% ptv coverage in the treatment applied with the 3d method are 31% higher than when applied with the 2d method.

src: bladder level reconstruction was performed in 11 cases . five patients were treated only by endoscopic incision . in the follow up period 4 patients showed long term urinary tract infections whereas 3 of them were treated endoscopically .
bt: In 11 cases, bladder level reconstruction was performed, and in the follow-up period 4 patients showed long-term urinary tract infections, while 3 of them were treated endoscopically and others developed chronic renal failure.

bt: The patient admitted that she had often lost doses before this relapse. The renal response has been maintained since she resumed her previous medications 2 years ago. Conclusion: We concluded that the frequent and severe relapses of lupus nephritis observed in young patients may actually be due to non-adhesion rather than refractory disease, which is worrying for long-term treatment.

src: the variables related to obesity , lipid profile , and glucose metabolism were also higher in nafld with diabetes and those with grade ii nafld without diabetes , as compared to controls . multivariate stepwise regression analysis showed a negative correlation between hrv and total cholesterol and fat percentage . the grade of nafld as well as diabetic status contributes to the decrease in the cardiovascular autonomic function , with diabetic status rather than grade of nafld playing a critical role .
bt: Variables related to obesity, lipid profile and glucose metabolism were also higher in patients with diabetes and in patients with grade ii diabetes without diabetes, compared to controls. The multivariate gradual regression analysis showed a negative correlation between hrv and total cholesterol and fat percentage.

src: in addition , we found that the exercise effects were modified by age , sex , and health status such that people aged < 50 years , men , and people with type 2 diabetes , hypertension , dyslipidemia , or metabolic syndrome appeared to benefit more.conclusionsthis meta - analysis showed that exercise significantly improved cardiorespiratory fitness and some cardiometabolic biomarkers . the effects of exercise were modified by age , sex , and health status . findings from this study have significant implications for future design of targeted lifestyle interventions .
bt: Furthermore, we found that the effects of exercise were modified by age, sex and health status, so that people < 50 years old, men and people with type 2 diabetes, hypertension, dyslipidemia or metabolic syndrome appeared to benefit more. Conclusions: This meta-analysis showed that exercise significantly improved cardiorespiratory fitness and some cardiometabolic biomarkers. The effects of exercise were modified by age, sex and health status.

src: objectivediabetic patients have a high prevalence of coronary artery disease ( cad ) , but timely diagnosis of cad remains challenging . we assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography ( ccta ) to detect cad in diabetic patients and to predict subsequent cardiac events.research design and methodswe analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad undergoing ccta ; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group . besides calcium scoring and the degree of the most severe stenosis , the atherosclerotic burden score counting the number of segments having either a nonstenotic plaque or a stenosis was recorded .
bt: Objective diabetes patients have a high prevalence of coronary artery disease (CAD), but timely diagnosis of CAD remains a challenge. We assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography (CCTA) to detect CAD in diabetic patients and predict subsequent heart events. Design and research methods analyzed 140 known CAD-free diabetic patients undergoing CCTA; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as control group. In addition to calcium score and the degree of most severe stenosis, atherosclerosis load score was recorded by counting the number of segments with non-stenosic plaque or stenosis, and genetic data was included to improve prediction of heart events.

src: objectivethe mental health of military personnel varies as a result of different cultural , political , and administrative factors . the purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in taiwan.materials and methodsthis cross - sectional study utilized the world health organization quality of life instrument , brief version , taiwan version , the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version , and the visual analog scale ( vas ) in several military units.resultsmore than half of the subjects ( 55.3% ) identified themselves as mentally unhealthy on the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version ; however , a higher percentage of officers perceived themselves as healthy ( 57.4% ) than did noncommissioned officers ( 38.5% ) or enlisted men ( 42.2% ) . officers also had higher total quality of life ( qol ) scores ( 83.98 ) than did enlisted men ( 79.67 ) .
bt: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in Taiwan. Materials and methods. This cross-sectional study used the World Health Organization's instrument for Quality of Life, short version, Taiwanese version, general health questionnaire-12, Chinese version, and visual analogue scale (VAS) in several military units. Results from the hormonal stress tests on subjects were also analyzed. Results from half of subjects (55.3%) were identified as more mentally ill in the general health questionnaire of China-12, however, a higher percentage.

src: tn - c sirna did not affect the corm-2-dependent increase of il-10 expression . in cells transfected with il-10 sirna , corm-2 had no effect on the lps - induced expression of tn - c and its downstream cytokines . these data suggest that il-10 mediates the inhibitory effect of co on tn - c and the downstream production of proinflammatory cytokines .
bt: In cells transplanted with the il-10 system, corm-2 had no effect on lps-induced expression of tn-c and its downstream cytokines.

src: after confirmation of behet 's disease on the basis of a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and erythema nodosum , remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy , colchicine , catheter directed thrombolysis and thrombectomy . however , whilst maintaining anticoagulation therapy , a newly developed pericardial aneurysmal dilatation was noted on follow - up radiologic evaluation . further evaluation revealed right coronary artery stenosis and a left coronary artery pseudo aneurysm ; these additional problems were treated with the nonsurgical insertion of an endovascular graft stent .
bt: Confirmation of Behet's disease based on a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and erythema nodosum, remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy, colchicine, catheter-directed thrombolysis and thrombectomy. However, while anticoagulation therapy was maintained, a recently developed pericardial aneurysmal dilation was observed in follow-up radiological evaluation. Subsequent evaluation revealed right coronary stenosis and left coronary pseudoaneurysm; these additional problems were treated with the non-surgical insertion of an endovascular graft stent and a new complication of right heart failure.
